contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|SRAM|sram}} '''SRAM''' may stand for: * [[Short-Range Attack Missile]] * [[Static random-access memory]], a type of semiconductor memory that uses bistable latching circuitry to store each bit * [[Shadow Random Access Memory]] * [[Service régional d'admission du Montréal métropolitain]], a network of Quebec CEGEPs * [[SRAM Corporation]] a manufacturer of bicycle components * Squash Racquets Association of Maharashtra, an official body of [[Squash (sport)|Squash]] in [[Maharashtra|Maharashtra, India]] * Safety Report Assessment Manual, a report by the UK's [[Health and Safety Executive]] * ''[[Scientific Review of Alternative Medicine]]'', a peer-reviewed journal devoted exclusively to analyzing the claims of alternative medicine * [[Screened Reflective Area Microphone]], Commercial term, SAM (Soundboard Area Microphone) * [[SRAM (video game)|''SRAM'' (video game)]], a textual adventure with graphics for the Amstrad CPC {{disambiguation}}
